description: There's a bit of innocence about this blue-eyed wonder with the smooth swimmer's build. Not having much to say and eager to have some fun, Brice wasted no time striping down for the camera. He initially came across as kind of shy and unsure but his nervous smiles soon relaxed as he began to yank his rod. Brice had a lot of fun giving us looks into the camera; teasing us with his wide-eyed stare.Brice knows what gets him off...and us as he continues to play with his cock and balls, fingers his ass, working himself into a stupor. We're drawing names to see who gets to lick him clean.
title: Brice, Scene #01
